data.name: NlpLead
data.value: What is it and how does it add value in the Organizational context?

data.name: NlpSection1Title
data.value: NLP is a tool focused on studying language and neurological processes that influence human behavior and communication.

data.name: NlpSection1Text
data.value: Through various techniques, it helps generate positive changes in the way we think, communicate, and act, allowing us to change patterns and achieve desired results.

data.name: NlpSection2Text
data.value: It is based on four fundamental pillars:

data.name: NlpList1
data.value: Result orientation: define clear goals that facilitate action.

data.name: NlpList2
data.value: Effective communication: both verbal and non-verbal, including empathy, active listening, and rapport.

data.name: NlpList3
data.value: Sensorial acuity: tune in to visual, auditory, and kinesthetic channels.

data.name: NlpList4
data.value: Behavioral flexibility: change strategies that do not work and adapt to the context.

data.name: NlpSection3Title
data.value: Techniques I use in my coaching:

data.name: NlpTech1
data.value: Anchoring: activate desired emotional states in work contexts.

data.name: NlpTech2
data.value: Reframing: transform limiting perceptions into learning opportunities.

data.name: NlpTech3
data.value: Modeling: replicate successful behaviors of leaders.

data.name: NlpTech4
data.value: Rapport: build trust through respectful communication.

data.name: NlpSection4Title
data.value: How do I apply NLP in your company?

data.name: NlpSection4Text
data.value: I design and facilitate personalized training to improve internal communication, team cohesion, motivation, and leadership with emotional effectiveness. My approach enhances self-confidence, reduces stress, and creates a productive work environment aligned with your goals to achieve the desired productivity.
